value:
select 'sisaxis' as ref_data_set_cd,'sisaxis' as ref_data_set_name,'axis' as sys_cd,'Y' as ltst_rec_ind,
'Y' as actv_rec_ind, current_timestamp as rec_crt_dtm,current_timestamp as rec_updt_dtm
from dual
union
select 'GrlMst' as ref_data_set_cd,'GrlMst' as ref_data_set_name,'penta' as sys_cd,'Y' as ltst_rec_ind,
'Y' as actv_rec_ind,current_timestamp as rec_crt_dtm,current_timestamp as rec_updt_dtm
from dual
union
select 'PrdCdg' as ref_data_set_cd,'PrdCdg' as ref_data_set_name,'penta' as sys_cd,'Y' as ltst_rec_ind,
'Y' as actv_rec_ind,current_timestamp as rec_crt_dtm,current_timestamp as rec_updt_dtm
from dual
union
select 'bd_sinie_x' as ref_data_set_cd,'bd_sinie_x' as ref_data_set_name,'penta' as sys_cd,'Y' as ltst_rec_ind,
'Y' as actv_rec_ind,current_timestamp as rec_crt_dtm,current_timestamp as rec_updt_dtm
from dual
union
select 'market' as 
ref_data_set_cd,'market' as ref_data_set_name,'market' as sys_cd,'Y' as ltst_rec_ind,
'Y' as actv_rec_ind,current_timestamp as rec_crt_dtm,current_timestamp as rec_updt_dtm
from dual
union
select 'global' as ref_data_set_cd,'global' as ref_data_set_name,'global' as sys_cd,'Y' as ltst_rec_ind,
'Y' as actv_rec_ind,current_timestamp as rec_crt_dtm,current_timestamp as rec_updt_dtm
from dual;

SELECT 
ref_data_set_cd,
ref_data_set_name,
sys_cd,
ltst_rec_ind,
actv_rec_ind,
etl_audit_id,
rec_crt_dtm,
rec_updt_dtm
FROM cdp_rdm.TREFERENCEDATASET
